title: Universal BRDF data format schema
description: A JSON schema for automatic validation of Universal BRDF data format proposed by BiRD project consortium in 2021

metadata.description: A section of a file that describes the measured or simulated BRDF data set from the point of view of data origin, simulation or measurement system's parameters, sample parameters and evironment. It also contains a globaly unique dataset identifier, specifices the data type, file name and records a timestamp of a measurement or simulation

data.description: an object with keys related to definition of BRDF function, variable properties of BRDF data and BRDF values themselves
